channel.title: Need some help... someone who actually knows -.-
channel.description: right, i need some real help... i replaced my stupid "richard npc" who sold capes.. with a customer... and she doesn't have a trade option.... i've been told to go into shop.cfg.... and it doesn't say customer in there...i want her to sell 100 of each pot.... super str...def....atk...mage..range.. and so so...can u actuaLLY GUIDE me through plz.. :( i've been on this for AGES!!!! and no-one knows or no-one is giving me the advice i need.... anceintmages is the only one to help me on it so far....plz i need help.

well how do u add???

item.title: Need some help... someone who actually knows -.-
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

nope you have to add the shop that u want the customer to sell then go in to npchandler and search for some 1 like santas npc which is 1552 then add under all his code the same code just change the npc id and the shop number and that should work

Read full topic
